name: Atletics 5000
description:
Athletics 5000!

A game I have been planning on making for years now.

The ultimate goal is to have an Olympics style game where there will be sprint, long distance running, pass the flame running, long jump, javelin throw and discis.

Current release is a prototype to test the fate of the project. If you like it, please leave a comment (even if you never planning on playing it), your support will be appriciated.

A BIG THANKS TO KENNY.NL FOR THE MONOCROME TILESET

INSTRUCTIONS

Press the arrow keys left and right to move the character
